elliev.title: Elliev: E-Reputation Control Tower
elliev.shortDesc: Strategic monitoring platform equipped with sentiment analysis AI.
elliev.fullDesc: A strategic monitoring platform acting as an extension of your marketing team. Elliev continuously monitors the web (Google News, Reddit, Twitter, TikTok) to detect brand mentions. Equipped with sentiment analysis AI, the tool filters noise, deduplicates information, and sorts by relevance. Unlike invasive solutions, it offers full user control (on-demand updates, easy cleaning).
elliev.context: Brands drown in noise. Missing a bad buzz or a key trend can be fatal.
elliev.challenge: Aggregating highly unstable disparate sources (Social Media APIs) while ensuring a clean and relevant feed without duplicates.
elliev.solution: Multi-Source Aggregator Architecture + NLP Filtering Pipeline.

tokenization-platform.title: Fund Tokenization Platform (POC)
tokenization-platform.shortDesc: Real World Asset (RWA) tokenization infrastructure on Blockchain for instant settlement (T+0).
tokenization-platform.fullDesc: The application is segmented into three distinct interfaces to address all value chain actors: 'Understand' (Education & Onboarding), 'Investor Area' (Neo-bank like UX), and 'Fund Console' (Back-Office / Admin). This POC validates that the technology is mature to reinvent customer experience and optimize banking operations.
tokenization-platform.context: To prove that replacing traditional banking infrastructure (silos, T+3 delays) with tokenized infrastructure results in a faster, transparent, and profitable system.
tokenization-platform.challenge: Settlement delays (T+2 / T+3), Opacity & Data Silos, High administrative costs, and High entry barriers.
tokenization-platform.solution: Atomic Settlement (T+0), Shared Ledger (DLT) for transparency, Smart Contracts for automation, and Fractionalization for accessibility.

job-monitor.title: Job Monitor AI
job-monitor.shortDesc: Discord bot orchestrator for 24/7 multi-platform job monitoring.
job-monitor.fullDesc: A true 'agent factory' integrated into Discord. The system allows each user to deploy their own autonomous worker that monitors the web continuously. The tool integrates over 30 recruitment platforms covering Europe and the world, aggregating disparate sources (APIs, Scraping, Career Sites) into a single, clean feed.
job-monitor.context: The fragmentation of the job market forces candidates to manually monitor dozens of sites, wasting precious time.
job-monitor.challenge: Industrialize scraping on protected sites (LinkedIn, Indeed) while maintaining isolated sessions for each user.
job-monitor.solution: Master-Slave architecture generating dynamic Node.js scripts on the fly. Intelligent queue system and proxy rotation for undetectability.

algo-trading.title: Algo Trading Bot
algo-trading.shortDesc: Quantitative trading bot (Momentum) on S&P 500 & Crypto with active risk management.
algo-trading.fullDesc: An autonomous portfolio manager that orchestrates the complete investment cycle. It analyzes the S&P 500 universe and a selection of high-beta assets to build a diversified portfolio. The algorithm favors relative strength (Momentum) while mathematically filtering out overly correlated assets to minimize systemic risk.
algo-trading.context: Manual investment often fails due to lack of emotional discipline in the face of volatility and trend reversals.
algo-trading.challenge: Capture the explosiveness of growth assets (Tech/Crypto) while guaranteeing an automatic and cold exit before stock market crashes.
algo-trading.solution: Pipeline 'Screener -> Filter -> Execute'. Use of trend filters (SMA), correlation matrices for selection, and server-side Trailing Stops orders to secure profits (Let Winners Run).

tiktok-automation.title: Viral News Automation
tiktok-automation.shortDesc: 100% autonomous pipeline: From Tech watch to viral TikTok publication.
tiktok-automation.fullDesc: A fully automated video production studio driven by AI. The system monitors Tech news, detects subjects with high viral potential via OpenAI, and manages the entire production chain: script writing, contextual media search, speech synthesis (TTS), dynamic editing, and automatic publication on TikTok.
tiktok-automation.context: Creating 'Short-Form' content requires exhausting regularity and responsiveness for a human creator.
tiktok-automation.challenge: Automate video editing (usually manual and creative) while keeping a captivating narrative and visual consistency.
tiktok-automation.solution: Creative ETL Pipeline: Scraping -> LLM Analysis (Viral Score) -> Asset Generation -> Programmatic Editing (MoviePy) -> Upload API.

auto-stream.title: Autoclip (Twitch Automation)
auto-stream.shortDesc: Viral detection pipeline and automatic vertical clip generation.
auto-stream.fullDesc: A complete 'Content Automation' software solution that monitors live Twitch streams to extract highlights. The system uses advanced behavioral analysis (audio/video) to detect excitement and automatically generate clips in vertical format (9:16) ready for TikTok/Reels, without human intervention.
auto-stream.context: Video editors spend hours watching replays to find 30 interesting seconds.
auto-stream.challenge: Develop a 'brain' capable of objectively understanding what a viral moment is without relying solely on chat, by analyzing sound and visual energy.
auto-stream.solution: Sequential Pipeline: Streamlink Capture -> Audio Analysis (Librosa) & Vision (OpenCV) -> Viral Composite Scoring -> Intelligent FFmpeg Cropping.

sports-arbitrage.title: Sports Arbitrage Bot
sports-arbitrage.fullDesc: A market 'sniper' designed to exploit pricing inefficiencies between local bookmakers and the international market. Unlike classic solutions based on Selenium, this bot uses API Reverse Engineering for maximum execution speed, allowing detection of mathematical discrepancies (Surebets) before market correction.
sports-arbitrage.context: Local bookmakers sometimes adjust their odds with a few seconds delay on the global market (Pinnacle/Bet365).
sports-arbitrage.challenge: The 'Smart Matching': Automatically reconcile entities named differently (e.g., 'Man. City' vs 'Manchester City FC') across heterogeneous data sources.
sports-arbitrage.solution: Modular Python Architecture: Direct API Scrapers (Reverse Engineering) -> Normalization Engine (Jaccard Similarity) -> Implied Probability Calculator.

smart-cv.title: Smart CV Extension
smart-cv.shortDesc: Generative AI Chrome Extension for contextual CV optimization.
smart-cv.fullDesc: An intelligent career assistant integrated into the browser (Manifest V3). The extension analyzes the active job offer (LinkedIn, WTTJ) and rewrites the CV in real-time to maximize 'Matching'. It offers two generation engines: a 'Fast-Track' mode (Single-Shot) for rapid iteration, and a 'Deep-Work' mode (Sequential Pipeline) using reasoning models (o1-mini) for strategic rewriting (STAR Method, Action Verbs).
smart-cv.context: Adapting your CV to each offer is essential but time-consuming. Generic candidates are filtered by ATS.
smart-cv.challenge: Orchestrate a complex AI pipeline (Extraction -> Enrichment -> Transposition -> PDF Rendering) directly in the browser without blocking the interface.
smart-cv.solution: Hybrid architecture with background.js state management. Injection of content scripts for scraping and client-side PDF generation via html2pdf.

ezlod.title: EZLOD (E-commerce Automation)
ezlod.shortDesc: E-commerce automation suite: StockX to Vinted pipeline.
ezlod.fullDesc: A complete software solution for sneaker resale automation. The system connects StockX market intelligence (Price, 360° Images) to the Vinted platform via a complex ETL pipeline. It transforms a simple product code (SKU) into a professional and optimized sales listing, ready to be published.
ezlod.context: Creating quality listings for sneaker resale is a repetitive and slow manual process (photos, description, pricing).
ezlod.challenge: Orchestrate the recovery of protected data (StockX GraphQL/360° Images) and automate publication on a closed platform (Vinted) without triggering security measures.
ezlod.solution: Hybrid Approach: API Scraping (GraphQL/HAR Analysis) for Data + Selenium/Requests for Vinted automation. Image processing engine (Pillow) to generate unique studio views.

seo-audit.title: SEO Auto-Audit
seo-audit.shortDesc: Bot for technical and structural analysis of websites.
seo-audit.fullDesc: An autonomous digital auditor capable of mapping the complete architecture of a site. It simulates the behavior of search engines to identify invisible technical debts that penalize referencing.
seo-audit.context: Manual audits cannot cover the exhaustiveness of thousands of pages of a modern site.
seo-audit.challenge: Efficiently crawl dynamic web applications (SPA) without being blocked or impacting target server performance.
seo-audit.solution: Respectful Asynchronous Crawler (Polite Crawler) with headless JS rendering and graph analysis.

tcg-collector.title: Next.js TCG Collector
tcg-collector.shortDesc: Card collection management application with intelligent OCR scanner.
tcg-collector.fullDesc: A complete platform for card collectors (TCG) combining collection management and image recognition. The application allows users to digitize their physical cards via a photo, automatically extract metadata (HP, Rarity, Set) thanks to AI, and track their collection progress with detailed statistics.
tcg-collector.context: Manual management of thousands of physical cards is tedious and prone to entry errors.
tcg-collector.challenge: Precisely identify a card among thousands of visually similar variants (Reverse Holo, Full Art) from a simple smartphone photo.
tcg-collector.solution: Hybrid computer vision pipeline: Azure Cognitive Services for textual OCR + Perceptual hashing algorithm for exact image matching.
